'Okay, let's wrap things up for today.'%K%P
'Phew, I'm exhausted.'%K%P
The duo finished their rehearsal\nand took a well-earned rest.%K%P
They were learning to cooperate better\nand didn't argue so much anymore.%K%P
'Your camera technique is really shaping up, too.'%K%P
'Heh heh. Good thing you practiced with me!'%K%P
'I never thought you'd do something like that\nwithout me.'%K%P
Kagura's individual video had secured\nher popularity.%K%P
The group name had been Kagura & Shuri (TBC)\nfor three days now.%K%P
Their training was going well, and people were\nstarting to recognize that their skills were\nimproving.%K%P
But there was still something we were missing.%K%P
Kagura and Shuri had plenty of passion,\nbut as a duo they just weren't coming together.%K%P
Even after all this time,\nthey still hadn't managed an error-free run through.%K%P
'I've got a long way to go, too...'%K%P
I muttered to myself while going\nthrough today's footage.%K%P
The girls' lack of unity had made me\nstart to doubt my own skills.%K%P
After practicing with Kagura I'd gotten\na little better with the camera,\nand my editing was improving, too.%K%P
As a result, I was more capable of showcasing\nShuri and Kagura's charms.%K%P
'I still get too nervous shooting\nthe sexy angles, though.'%K%P
It's not like I was trying to take the videos in that\ndirection, but it inevitably ended up that way.%K%P
Just watching got me all hot and bothered.\nI couldn't help it, I wasn't used to being\naround girls.%K%P
'Just remember, they're goddesses...\nGoddesses... Goddesses...'%K%P
'What's that about goddesses?'%K%P
I turned around and found Sara standing behind me.%K%P
'Sara? What are you doing here...?'%K%P
'Your aunt asked me to bring you up some tea...'%K%P
Sara hesitated.\nIt seemed like she was worried about intruding.%K%P
'Is something worrying you?\nIf you need advice, you can always ask me.'%K%P
'I wouldn't say I'm worried, it's just...'%K%P
What was I supposed to say?\nThat Shuri and Kagura were TOO beautiful?%K%P
'Is it about the duo? \nIt must be hard trying to manage it all on your own.'%K%P
'No, not at all. \nI enjoy helping them out.'%K%P
'So what's wrong? \nYou're looking really down.'%K%P
'...Promise not to roll your eyes if I tell you?'%K%P
I ended up spilling everything.%K%P
'I see... I don't blame you,\nthose two are really pretty.'%K%P
'What do you think I should do?'%K%P
'It wouldn't be fair for me to give entrants advice. \nBut since it's you I'd be advising,\nI don't see a problem.'%K%P
Her conscience assuaged,\nSara went on to tell me her idea.%K%P
'You just need to get more comfortable around girls.'%K%P
'Well yeah, but how...?'%K%P
'As luck would have it,\nyou have one right here with you now.'%K%P
*Hug*%K%P
Before I knew what was happening, I found\nmyself enveloped in Sara's chest.%K%P
'W-W-What are you doing?!'%K%P
'Hugging you.'%K%P
I could work that much out for myself. \nI just wanted to know why.%K%P
'See, there's nothing to be afraid of.'%K%P
'I'm not exactly afraid of women or anything...'%K%P
'But this has got your pulse racing, hasn't it? \nI can feel your heartbeat.'%K%P
My heart must have been hammering really fast.%K%P
'I feel yours, too. It's pretty strong.'%K%P
'You know, I'm not very used to spending time\nwith guys. So you and I are in the same boat,\nYamato.'%K%P
Sara felt the same as me. \nHearing that took a huge load off my mind.%K%P
'And I'm sure Shuri and Kagura are the same. \nWe may be goddesses, but we're not all that\ndifferent from humans.'%K%P
'We get nervous trying out new things,\nbut we move past those obstacles to get closer\nto our dreams.'%K%P
'They may look calm on the outside,\nbut everyone has their own worries.'%K%P
Sara hugged me even tighter.%K%P
I could feel her soft warmth, her sweet fragrance,\nand now even the rhythm of her heartbeat.%K%P
'You don't need to hold back what you feel. \nThat's what gives us our power, after all.'%K%P
Those kinds of emotions became Sakimitama,\nthe source of divine energy.%K%P
'It's okay to like the way they look or to get\nexcited. Just be honest with your feelings.'%K%P
'Sara...'%K%P
She hadn't seen anything wrong with how I felt.%K%P
Maybe I should just accept the excitement that\nI felt when I was behind the camera.%K%P
'Well? Have you calmed down a little?'%K%P
'As far as Shuri and Kagura go, yeah...'%K%P
'Really? It feels like your pulse is racing even\nfaster than it was before.'%K%P
'I can't help it, what with you\nhugging me like this...'%K%P
'Oh!'%K%P
Sara was suddenly more aware of what she was doing.%K%P
I could feel her pulse start to speed up, too.%K%P
'I'm so sorry, I wasn't thinking...'%K%P
'It's all good, really. \nGetting excited is a good thing, right?'%K%P
'That's right.\nThere's no need to bottle it all up...'%K%P
'Even I've started to feel a little flustered now.'%K%P
Sara didn't deny her own feelings, either.%K%P
To demonstrate, she hugged me close one more time.%K%P
Sara is a top-class idol, but opening up to me\nlike this as if she's a normal girl is just...%K%P
If she kept this up, I really might fall for her.%K%P
